001package com.github.sormuras.bach.external;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.ExternalModuleLocator;
004
005/** Locates "Jackson" modules via their Maven Central artifacts. */
006public record Jackson(String version) implements ExternalModuleLocator {
007
008  private static final String MODULE_PREFIX = "com.fasterxml.jackson";
009  private static final String MAVEN_GROUP = "com.fasterxml.jackson";
010
011  /**
012   * Constructs a new Jackson module locator with the given version.
013   *
014   * @param version the Jackson version
015   */
016  public static Jackson version(String version) {
017    return new Jackson(version);
018  }
019
020  @Override
021  public String caption() {
022    return "com.fasterxml.jackson.[*] -> Jackson " + version;
023  }
024
025  @Override
026  public String locate(String module) {
027    if (!module.startsWith(MODULE_PREFIX)) return null;
028    var group =
029        switch (module) {
030          case "com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation",
031              "com.fasterxml.jackson.core",
032              "com.fasterxml.jackson.databind" -> "com.fasterxml.jackson.core";
033          default -> {
034            if (module.startsWith("com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat."))
035              yield "com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat";
036            if (module.startsWith("com.fasterxml.jackson.datatype."))
037              yield "com.fasterxml.jackson.datatype";
038            if (module.startsWith("com.fasterxml.jackson.jakarta.rs."))
039              yield "com.fasterxml.jackson.jakarta.rs";
040            if (module.startsWith("com.fasterxml.jackson.module."))
041              yield "com.fasterxml.jackson.module";
042            if (module.startsWith("com.fasterxml.jackson.jaxrs."))
043              yield "com.fasterxml.jackson.jaxrs";
044            if (module.startsWith("com.fasterxml.jackson.jr."))
045              yield "com.fasterxml.jackson.jr";
046            yield MAVEN_GROUP;
047          }
048        };
049    var artifact =
050        switch (module) {
051          case "com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation" -> "jackson-annotations";
052          case "com.fasterxml.jackson.jakarta.rs.cbor" -> "jackson-jakarta-rs-cbor-provider";
053          case "com.fasterxml.jackson.jakarta.rs.json" -> "jackson-jakarta-rs-json-provider";
054          case "com.fasterxml.jackson.jakarta.rs.smile" -> "jackson-jakarta-rs-smile-provider";
055          case "com.fasterxml.jackson.jakarta.rs.xml" -> "jackson-jakarta-rs-xml-provider";
056          case "com.fasterxml.jackson.jakarta.rs.yaml" -> "jackson-jakarta-rs-yaml-provider";
057          case "com.fasterxml.jackson.jaxrs.cbor" -> "jackson-jaxrs-cbor-provider";
058          case "com.fasterxml.jackson.jaxrs.smile" -> "jackson-jaxrs-smile-provider";
059          case "com.fasterxml.jackson.jaxrs.json" -> "jackson-jaxrs-json-provider";
060          case "com.fasterxml.jackson.jaxrs.xml" -> "jackson-jaxrs-xml-provider";
061          case "com.fasterxml.jackson.jaxrs.yaml" -> "jackson-jaxrs-yaml-provider";
062          case "com.fasterxml.jackson.jr.annotationsupport" -> "jackson-jr-annotation-support";
063          case "com.fasterxml.jackson.jr.ob" -> "jackson-jr-objects";
064          case "com.fasterxml.jackson.datatype.joda" -> "jackson-datatype-joda-money";
065          case "com.fasterxml.jackson.datatype.jsonorg" -> "jackson-datatype-json-org";
066          case "com.fasterxml.jackson.datatype.jsonp" -> "jackson-datatype-jakarta-jsonp";
067          case "com.fasterxml.jackson.dataformat.javaprop" -> "jackson-dataformat-properties";
068          case "com.fasterxml.jackson.module.jakarta.xmlbind" -> "jackson-module-jakarta-xmlbind-annotations";
069          case "com.fasterxml.jackson.module.jaxb" -> "jackson-module-jaxb-annotations";
070          case "com.fasterxml.jackson.module.noctordeser" -> "jackson-module-no-ctor-deser";
071          case "com.fasterxml.jackson.module.paramnames" -> "jackson-module-parameter-names";
072          default -> module.substring(14).replace('.', '-');
073        };
074    return Maven.central(group, artifact, version);
075  }
076}
